snippet.title: Future of Cloud: Language of Nature
snippet.description:
In this episode of Future of Cloud: Language of Nature, we trace how the logic of living systems is shaping the next era of computing. At the Met Office, HPC and AI work in tandem to model the atmosphere with unprecedented precision. 

Across the supply chain, partners like Mondra use cloud-scale intelligence to measure and reduce environmental impact with the fidelity of an ecosystem. And at the Chelsea Flower Show, innovators are using AI to listen to plant systems — translating electrical signals, stress responses, hydration patterns, and growth rhythms into insights humans can understand.

The result is a new blueprint for the cloud: one inspired by biological communication, accelerated by AI, and capable of reshaping everything from climate modelling to sustainable logistics. This is where nature’s language becomes the future of infrastructure — and where the next frontier begins.

Learn more: https://msft.it/6058tPlGK

#Microsoft #MicrosoftAzure #AiEcosystemIntelligence
